root.name: Scivelation
root.description: OverviewScivelation is an upcoming third-person shooter from Ukrainian developer Black Wing Foundation. The game is set to be published by TopWare Interactive, for a fourth-quarter 2014 release. Expectations are that the game will be released on the Playstation 4 and the Xbox One.The game is being developed on the Unreal Engine, and is expected to run the fourth iteration of the engine.PlotIn Scivelation, the fate of a dystopian society unfolds through the eyes of two playable characters: Mikhael Ivanov, a captain in the Resistance, and Elisha Amano, a defected Regime scientist. Ivanov is regarded as a "soldier" type-of-character, and will be used for gun-play, whereas Amano is focused on the stealth aspects of the game.
